replies.body:
obligatory ‘3rd’

also, wish i could go to pax but got so much work and tests
I got work too, but don't tell my boss.
Hi, its me your boss. I hope to see you at work.

I'm driving down two days before my first final

probably not a great idea but worth

Wait, i need friends to get the free stuff? 

Aw, man.
Its ok! Make some on the floor! Start a "looking for group" area :P
Need a jungler?  I also need friends!
Can i get pax sivir skin over there?
Ah, this is awesome news to hear! My friends and I will be returning to PAX East this year, Fri-Sat, in full cosplay, so we'll totally catch every event we can! =D {{champion:202}}
That's awesome! I hope to see you there. ^_^ I'll be cosplaying Gnar! - If you can, please join us at the League cosplay gathering too. https://www.facebook.com/events/172222093344688
First time going to pax cant wait!!!
congrats, have fun lol make sure to meet pokimane
Will it be sivir again?
I'll be there Thursday and Friday.
YAY! Make sure to come say hi! I'll be the one dressed up as Mega Gnar :D
My wife is going as Miss Fortune. Can't wait to see Mega Gnar.
You both should come to the cosplay meet up!
I'm so much more excited for PAX East after this post!!  Thank you!
Ayyyy I'll be there Friday and Saturday. I'm digging the free team role shirts.{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Maybe.. a .. pax central? in Nebraska? I cant do much traveling but I've played league since 2010 and would absolutely love to go to a Pax event and finally meet some of my favorite humans (anyone involved with Riot btw) {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Amen brother im in iowa
You guys are coming back to PAX West this September, right? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Where is PAX going to be?
PAX East takes place in Boston :D
2nd {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Its ok, I still love you.
If I don't cosplay, am I allowed to wait for Mega Gnar outside the cosplay lounge?
I'll be around the shirt store area, so no need to line up to say hi :D
Porque no PAX West <:)
1st{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Hey, I was wondering if I could get shirts for friends who were not able to make it this year, or am I unable to if they are not there in person? See you all there!
I wish you guys went to PAX West :(
Glad to hear there will be more this year!  It was nice meeting Swimbananas and Jynx last year.  Thanks again for saving my wifes costume!
Would be cool if they ever showed up to PAX south
I've always wanted to see League at PAX :3 Too bad I'm going on Sunday T.T
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{sticker:sg-lux}} So who's the PAX girl this year? I wish Lux or Annie, Zoe is good as well.
Will the PAX Skins be available for purchase???
will pax skins be on sale?
Omg im so excited to meet Lily, Poki and Scarra!!! I was already so ready for pax now i might explode from excitement AHHHHH.
Are they also going to pax west or only east?
Riot, come to Atlanta during Dragon Con!! Big industry and tons of gamers!!!
Move PAX east to Atlanta. Big industry down here. Tons of gamers!!!

Yo Riot no more pax skins or wha? i own all but twisted fate skin we should see 
a new skin def. for the 10 year anniversary out of beta. Whatcha think in your opinion not riot's that is {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I wished I could go but unfortunately I don't live in the east coast {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
Please come to PAX West too {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Prepare yourselves for I, the one and only Phoenix Quinn, shall be in attendance all four days cosplaying as Phoenix Quinn!
Too bad I don't know any of the people who make up my team of 5 :T {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
